0.1.name: wordpress/metaweblog-api-client
0.1.description: Re-posts published posts to anything that implements the MetaWeblog API (such as Drupal) with directions back to the original Wordpress blog for updates and comments. Also edits and deletes according to WordPress' actions. MWAC is based on Blogger API Client and the bloggerapi class (made available by Beau Lebens). This plugin was produced as part of DIG's infrastructure, a member of MIT's CSAIL. Licensed under BSD license in LICENSE
